sentences.en: A large part of state regulation consists of occupational licensing.
sentences.cn: 大部分州的管理涉及行业的特许批准.

sentences.en: By 1925, blue-collar workers in manufacturing industry had become the largest occupational group.
sentences.cn: 到1925年，制造业的蓝领工人已成为最大的职业群体。

sentences.en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，容易感冒是这个行业的职业性风险。

sentences.en: Co - ordinate site occupational health & safety program including committee meetings and documentation.
sentences.cn: 确定质量体系文件要求的工作区域的安全和健康,确保两者之间吻合.

sentences.en: Drivers have to take occupational risks.
sentences.cn: 司机要冒一些职业风险.

sentences.en: For many years, experts in occupational health have puzzled over symptoms reported by office workers, including headache, nausea and fatigue.
sentences.cn: 多年以来，职业保健专家一直在苦苦研究办公室职员所反映的诸如头疼、恶心和疲劳等症状。

sentences.en: Getting injured is an occupational hazard (= a risk that always exists in a particular job or activity ) of the sport.
sentences.cn: 受伤是这项运动的职业性危害。

sentences.en: He took occasion to brief me on his port - hostilities occupational plans for Germany.
sentences.cn: 他概括地告诉我有关占领德国后占领方面的敌意问题.

sentences.en: Is there any concrete information or is it occupational therapy?
sentences.cn: 有任何具体信息吗或是工作放松?

sentences.en: Recent figures show other occupational cancer risks.
sentences.cn: 最近的统计数字显示了其他职业性癌症的危险性.

sentences.en: Skin disorders are common occupational diseases among factory workers.
sentences.cn: 皮肤病是工人中常见的职业病.

sentences.en: Some received substantial occupational assistance in the form of low-interest loans.
sentences.cn: 一些人以低息贷款的形式得到了有力的职业援助。

sentences.en: Study on Occupational Health Surveillance System Used during Construction of Qinghai - Tibet Railway.
sentences.cn: 青藏 铁路建设职业健康监护系统研究.

sentences.en: This article forward a proposal on accounting personnels'occupational ethics construction.
sentences.cn: 本文就会计人员的职业道德建设提出一点建议.

sentences.en: Ultimate responsibility for occupational health and safety rests with top management.
sentences.cn: 职业健康安全的最终责任由最高管理者承担.

sentences.en: Women have yet to achieve wage or occupational parity in many fields.
sentences.cn: 女性在很多领域还没能争取到薪金、职位方面的平等。

trans.tran_en: relating to or caused by your job
